messages.title: Local team chosen to stand up for YOU!
messages.content: Sydenham ward focus. Local campaigners winning for you.

messages.title: Lewisham failing on housing
messages.content: Labour-run Lewisham Council has failed to deliver the 'decent standard' by a huge 70%. Only 3 out of 10 council homes in the borough have met the standard, despite Labour's promise of 100% meeting the standard by this year.

messages.title: Crime survey feedback
messages.content: Lib Dem Parliamentary candidate for Lewisham West & Penge, Alex Feakes, has welcomed residents' responses to the Crime Survey distributed with the recent edition of Sydenham Ward Focus.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris Maines promises to freeze council tax for at least two years.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build our first council housing for a decade
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to build the first council houses in Lewisham for ten years.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Reduce waste and double the amount Lewisham recycles
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aim to reduce waste and improve recycling rates in Lewisham.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strengthen local police teams with support from the council
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to strengthen local police presence with council support.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Create new youth facilities and opportunities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proposal to create new facilities and opportunities for the youth in Lewisham.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Work to abolish Lewisham's failed Mayoral system
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Initiatives to abolish the existing mayoral system in Lewisham.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Life-long Labour voters are turning to the Lib Dems in their droves. They've been taken for granted by Labour for long enough!

housing.content: Labour-run Lewisham Council has failed to deliver the 'decent standard' by a huge 70%. Only 3 out of 10 council homes in the borough have met the standard, despite Labour's promise of 100% meeting the standard by this year.

images.caption: Local team chosen to stand up for YOU!

leaflet.additionalNotes: It's Lib Dem or Labour around here!
